messages.speech:
Here is a list of suitable exercises based on your previous choices. If you want to train a different area, use the HUD to type or speak the phrases from the last section.
You can only do this once, otherwise I won't understand and you have to select "Reset JimBot", and follow the instructions on the TV screen.
You can select any of the exercises to view more details about them. Or, if you're ready to work out then select "Start Workout" on the TV screen.
